shared.model.move

Class RoadBuildingCardRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.move.MoveRequest
      • shared.model.move.RoadBuildingCardRequest

  • public class RoadBuildingCardRequest
extends MoveRequest
    RoadBuildingCardRequest object is used to encapsulate the data sent on a RoadBuildingCard call to the server.
